title: DIsconnected
body: In the middle of a ranked game, internet is completely fine, we are winning and then all the sudden it disconnects me, I try relogging and I get a "unexpected error has occured". This is one of the stupidest ways you can lose a game and needs to be fucking fixed.

replies.body: I'm not seeing any issues with servers right now.  What ISP are you using?  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities with local problems blocking you from getting in game.  In the meantime, I'll keep an eye out if I see anything weird going on.
I can't connect to any games now as well.
